articles.author: Matthew Futterman
articles.title: Barbora Krejcikova Wins the French Open - The New York Times
articles.description: Unseeded but the sentimental favorite, Krejcikova defeated Anastasia Pavlyuchenkova 6-1, 2-6, 6-4, to win the women’s singles title in Paris.
articles.content: Krejcikova received the winners trophy from Martina Navratilova, an 18-time Grand Slam tournament singles winner, who defected from the former Czechoslovakia in 1975, 20 years before Krejcikova was b… [+967 chars]

articles.author: AP
articles.title: Barbora Krejcikova wins maiden Grand Slam title at French Open - The Indian Express
articles.description: After beating Anastasia Pavlyuchenkova in the final, Barbora Krejcikova will now try to become the first woman in 21 years to win both the French Open singles and doubles titles in the same year.
articles.content:
Unseeded Barbora Krejcikova won her first Grand Slam title by beating Anastasia Pavlyuchenkova 6-1, 2-6, 6-4 in the French Open final Saturday.
This was only the fifth major tournament in singles fo… [+2380 chars]

articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: Barbora Krejcikova defeats Anastasia Pavlyuchenkova to win first French Open title - Sportsnet.ca
articles.description: Czech doubles star Barbora Krejcikova has won her first Grand Slam singles title, defeating Russia's Anastasia Pavlyuchenkova 6-1, 2-6, 6-3 to win the French Open.
articles.content:
PARIS — Thinking of her late coach the whole time, Barbora Krejcikova went from unseeded to Grand Slam champion at the French Open.
Putting aside a shaky set, Krejcikova won just her fifth major tou… [+5052 chars]

articles.title: Malaysia's undertakers overwhelmed with Covid-19 deaths, SE Asia News & Top Stories - The Straits Times
articles.description: Volunteer undertakers say they are seeing up to 10 cases a day now.. Read more at straitstimes.com.
